name: Mandarin System (Paint Version)
description:
To move you have to jump.

    Made for the Paint Jam 2018 with the Godot Engine.
    Controls: Play with the arrow keys or
          Play with the D-Pad or
          Play with the Buttons on the controller or
          Play with your mouse by clicking the mandarins
          (Combine them if you want)

This is my first published game.

#paintjam
